name: CrystalFox
description:
Collect all the Crystals.
A small prototype I made using only #vinik24 pallete for the Winter 2022 Jam.

Control:
A and D   -> Left and Right   , W and S  -> Look up and Down  , Space to Jump, E to Interact or Restart Game.

Music:

https://freesound.org/people/BloodPixelHero/

Pallete Used:
#vinik24
